features.name: Chat
steps: On the left bottom part of Gmail, there will be list of persons online
Click on the name of person you want to talk to
A chat window will open, Type the text to start the chat

features.name: recieve a mail
steps: There will be an notification message from Gmail to click and read the mail
You can mark this as starred Email in left function box
You can mark this in trash if this is a junk mail

features.name: Search a mail
steps: Click the searching box on top of the desk window
Enter email's key words or mail address in searching box
Click the filtered emails you want to search

features.name: Send a mail
steps: Click on compose mail
Enter sender's email in To text box
Type Subject in Subject text box
Type Email content in the text box
Click on send

features.name: Facebook Search
steps: Type the name of person you want to search or the topic you interested in in the search text box
Search box is location of the top of the Facebook Home page

features.name: Post your facebook
steps: You can watch some video or images by scroll down and leave ‘like’,’command’ and ‘share’
You can post your own video and share with friends from create your story box

features.name: Create an account and sign in
steps: Input your name, date of birth and gender
Click sign up
After sign up, You will receive a message with your permission to turn on Notifications
You need to verify your email address or phone number on the link of the website by using the verification code in your email box or message box.
After type the code, click continue. It will show that your account has been confirmed.
There will be some friend suggestions, you can add some of them if you like.

features.name: Ride
steps: You can enter the locations of your destination in 'Where to' box or pin the your loaction on map
Meet your driver, you can track their arrival on the map, wait for them at your pickup location.
Make sure you’re getting into the right car with the right driver by matching the license plate, car make and model, and driver photo with what’s provided in your app.
After arrive the destination, make a payment by credit card or Uber Cash balance.
Rate the dirver, let the uber know how your trip went

features.name: Create Account and sign in
steps: Input your name, location, phone number, Card information, date of birth and gender
Click sign up
After sign up, You will receive a message with your permission to turn on Notifications and locations
You need to verify your email address or phone number on the link of the website by using the verification code in your email box or message box.
After type the code, click continue. It will show that your account has been confirmed.

features.name: Friends circle
steps: You can watch your friends post in discovery page of friend circle
You can also share your own post with the camera icon on the right top of the page

features.name: WeChat Search
steps: Type the name of person or the content want to search in the search text box
Search box is location of the top of the WeChat

features.name: WeChat friend Search
steps: Type the name ID of person or phone number you want to search in the new friend search text box
Search new friend box is location of the top of the contact page
You can also add the friend face to face by QR code

features.name: Create an account and sign in
steps: Input your name location date of birth and gender
Click sign up,sometimes you might need your friends to help you do the verifacation
After sign up, You will receive a message with the permission to turn on Notifications
You need to verify your email address or phone number on the link of the website by using the verification code in your email box or message box.
After type the code, click continue. It will show that your account has been confirmed.
There will be some friend suggestions from your phone contact, you can add some of them if you like.
